title: Echoes of Time
description: For Etienne and me, our love has always left a trace.  It reigns over kingdoms, and rules over time.  With Etienne now in the present day, the echoes of time grow louder.  We must face the answers we seek to set things right. However, we must be incredibly careful. One false move and everything we love will be destroyed. And this time, could be the end of our surviving trace.   Echoes of Time is the epic finale in The Surviving Time Series.
author: Calia Read
